title: Cover Picture and Issue Information
content: Strawberry tree (A. unedo) with ripe fruits in a typical landscape of Sierra de Andujar Natural Park in autumn. This tree is one of the most abundant fleshy-fruited species in Mediterranean ecosystems of Southern Spain and represents the preferred fruit of foxes and martens in Burgos et al.â€™s study area (2024). Photo by Tamara Burgos.
